Is english an intonation  language?	Yes
Is english a de  jure  official  language  of Israel?	no
Is the stressed  syllable called the nuclear  syllable?	yes
Does english grammar have minimal inflection?	Yes
Did old English develop into Middle English?	Yes
Are books, magazines, and newspapers written in English available?	yes
Is the syntax of German different with different rules?	yes
Is it true that semantics causes a number of false friends?	true
Here , are all syllables unstressed , except the syllables/words best and done , which are stressed ?	yes
Are many words describing the navy , types of ships , and other objects or activities on the water of dutch origin ?	yes
Are local variations in the formal written version of the language quite limited , being restricted largely to the spelling differences between British and American English ?	yes
